data.title: Top Airbnbs & Vacation rentals in Offenbach
data.meta_description: Looking for the vacation rentals or Airbnbs in Offenbach? Visit cozycozy to compare prices and book your budget-friendly stay for the perfect holiday!

Sympathisches Retro Apartment

apartment - Offenbach am Main

This Offenbach am Main apartment is conveniently located just 5.3 miles from Eiserner Steg and 5.5 miles from the Cathedral of St. Bartholomew, offering easy access to the city's main attractions. The apartment has received very good user ratings for its cleanliness and overall experience, while the location has been rated as good.

The 2-bedroom apartment comfortably accommodates up to 4 guests in its 520 square feet of space. Guests can enjoy features like a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a private terrace or balcony, a garden, and free on-site parking.

apartment - Offenbach am Main

This Offenbach am Main apartment, Waldhof Residenz, is located just 4 miles from Klassikstadt and Eiserner Steg, offering easy access to the city's attractions. The apartment consistently receives very good ratings for location, cleanliness, and overall experience.

The apartment features a comfortable living space with a sofa, seating area, and a flat-screen TV. Guests can enjoy a private entrance, a well-equipped kitchen with a fridge, microwave, and dishwasher, free Wi-Fi, and a terrace for relaxing and enjoying the fresh air.

Tulpen Residenz is a comfortable apartment located in Offenbach, just a short drive from attractions like Klassikstadt, the Cathedral of St. Bartholomew, and Eiserner Steg in Frankfurt. The apartment complex boasts high ratings for location, cleanliness, and overall experience.

This 2-bedroom, 1-bathroom apartment offers a spacious living area with a sofa bed, seating area, and flat-screen TV. Guests can enjoy amenities like a fully equipped kitchen, a private terrace or balcony, a garden, and a children's playground.

Fisherman's Lodge: 1 Living / Bedroom - Bathroom - Kitchen - 30 Minutes To Frankfurt

apartment - Offenbach am Main

This waterfront rental is located in Offenbach am Main, just a short walk from Rumpenheim Palace and within a few miles of Isenburg Palace and Hessen Center. The apartment enjoys an excellent user rating, indicating a positive experience for previous guests. This one-bedroom dwelling comfortably accommodates up to five guests. The apartment features a fully equipped kitchen, a relaxing spa tub, and a private patio, perfect for enjoying the fresh air and views.

Schaefer Apartments - Residence Green Garden

studio - Offenbach am Main

This studio apartment, part of the Schaefer Apartments - Residence Green Garden, is conveniently located in Offenbach, just a short distance from popular attractions like Eiserner Steg, the Cathedral of St. Bartholomew, and the Städel Museum. The property has received excellent ratings for its cleanliness and location, ensuring a comfortable and enjoyable stay.

The studio features a well-equipped kitchen with a fridge, freezer, microwave oven, and dishwasher. Guests can enjoy the garden, terrace, and parking, as well as amenities like air conditioning, free Wi-Fi, a coffee machine, and a TV.

This 2-bedroom apartment is located in Gravenbruch, a district in Neu-Isenburg, about 8 miles from Frankfurt's city center and its main attractions. The apartment has received very good ratings for location, cleanliness, and overall user experience.

The 540 square foot apartment includes a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and microwave, a playground for children, free parking, and free Wi-Fi. Guests can enjoy the convenience of an elevator and a non-smoking environment.

Apartment Lucian

apartment - Offenbach am Main

Apartment Lucian is located in Offenbach, just four miles from Klassikstadt and four and a half miles from Eiserner Steg, offering a convenient base for exploring the city and its attractions. This apartment has received excellent ratings for its cleanliness, location, and overall experience.

This three-bedroom apartment comfortably accommodates up to six guests and features a living room, a flat-screen TV, and a fully equipped kitchen with a fridge, freezer, and dishwasher. Enjoy the convenience of a private entrance, private check-in/check-out, free Wi-Fi, an elevator, a balcony with mountain views, a garden, parking, and a bathroom with a bath and shower.
